scripts.build: npm run download-firebase-static-files && npm run generate-dotenv tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && vite build && npm run postprocess-index-html && npx prettier --write dist/index.html
scripts.generate-dotenv: npm run node-ts ./scripts/generate-dotenv.ts && npm run update-firebase-static-files
scripts.generate-dotenv-dev: npm run node-ts-dev ./scripts/generate-dotenv.ts && npm run update-firebase-static-files
scripts.test: echo "Error: no tests exist yet" && exit 1
scripts.node-ts-dev: echo press F5 in vs-code && node --inspect-brk --import ./scripts/loader.mjs
